channel.title: 2 questions help me please
channel.description:
1- How I add an npc monster? I added 1 in autospawn with all the thing and it's say error.
2- How I made work the rub of the glory for teleport me at a place?
Thanks.

item.title: 2 questions help me please
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Well i’ll help you with the adding a monster, open up autospawn.cfg and put this in…

You can put it in after any npc perferably hans, after that it should look like this:

spawn = 236 2756 3499 0 0 0 0 0 1 (idk wth this is)

Put this after any other spawn thingy in your auto-spawn, this is also just an example, work with this format though.

Read full topic
